text: Hello, Can someone pls help us with this issue? <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/An-error-occurred-while-validating-the-integration-authorization/m-p/801627#M64537>

Yeah now I understand what you're after, sorry for the delay was celebrating the 4th. Currently I'm 95% sure you can't do this through the api, looks like you can only get this information for users not for properties (or, channels, objects, etc)
Hey <@U058WANL29G>, quick question, what are you trying to do after relating the meeting with a scheduling page?

Hey <@U01QVR44MEY> , the aim is to have two channels to manage the meetings, the first one is "calendly like” UI and the second one a chat bot that consumes the HubSpot API, at the moment I am able to create meetings through the API but I have no idea how to relate them with a specific scheduling page "calendly like”
Honestly, the best way to trouble shoot this is to copy the install url straight from app settings under the auth tab
See if there are any errors, and go from there

Hi All,
I am looking at Sentry also for error reporting. How are your experiences this far?
<@U01QVR44MEY> What are the downsides that you experienced?
It doesn't work, Tried to uninstall, changed scopes, removed scopes etc but getting agreement screen where there is no chance to agree because it redirects instantly.
